google_play_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the slow response. You can configure which notification parts are spoken in Text-To-Speech -> TTS Message. Removing #m will remove the notification content message. If you want, you could replace it with #t for the ticker message, which would ideally be a shorter summary of the notification, but not all apps use it that way.

google_play_reviews.content: Best voice notification ever made!

I've been using VN for many years. On my 6th phone now, and VN is one of my Core apps. Very Customizable to your specific needs. I love having my notifications read to me as I drive or work, I don't have to stop and look at my phone, I just keep on working. Thank you for your hard work, please keep supporting this project.
Ha used it more then 6 years and surprised to get new upgrade üòÖ just new icon not cool looks...
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Glad you like it! I'm not a very good UI designer and the icon was contributed by someone else. Long story short, I was having motivation issues with the project and this update was mainly to get it back on Google Play. I no longer use it myself, but the user base remained strong so I felt obligated to do it for the community.

google_play_reviews.content: and 3 years was using the app without a problem. Now since update it does not detected any installed app. Only system ones on the list...
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the trouble. The issue is fixed in v1.2.2, which should be available on Google Play soon once it gets through review, or you may download it from GitHub now.

It's a brilliant app. It has lots of customisation settings and has worked as expected for me. For instance, I've successfully set the app to ignore messages from certain WhatsApp group chats. I've used this app with a Galaxy S6, Pixel 2XL, Z2 Plus and Oneplus 6t. I've only used the app for Bluetooth purposes in two cars for handsfree alerts. It's worked dependably well in all situations. The only issue I have is that I cannot find a way (if there is a way) to stop the app reading the numbers of people who I already have in my contacts book. Other apps of this type have this function.
